data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Karak, Jordan into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Karak, Jordan
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Karak who will make disciples who make disciples.
Jesus, purify the 551 believers in the state of Karak to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Karak.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Arab, Saudi - Najdi people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Karak, Jordan to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Karak, Jordan to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.section_summary:
the state of Karak, Jordan has a population of 207,300.

We estimate Karak has 551 people who might know Jesus, 4,169 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 202,580 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 376 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Karak, Jordan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Karak
location.cities_list: Dimona, ‘Izrā, Qīr Moāv, Karak City, Safi
